reviewText: I had been looking for some guidance as to which specific exercises would be best for preventing further deterioration and rebuilding bone.  I found this video very helpful in explaining osteoporsis and the rationale for the exercises.  The instructions for the workout were clear and I could watch and see exactly what needs to be done.  Options were given so that I could accomodate the exercise to my level of fitness and flexibility.  The speaker seemed to be medically knowledgable.  I have quite a few exercise tapes, some of which are very good and others very bad.  I would rate this as among the best and very user friendly.
